Title: Silence of the Lambs
Description: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer.

Genre.Name: Thriller
Genre.Description: Thriller film, also known as suspense film or suspense thriller, is a broad film genre that involves excitement and suspense in the audience.

Director.Name: Jonathan Demme
Director.Bio: Robert Jonathan Demme was an American director, producer, and screenwriter.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
Description: Aragorn is revealed as the heir to the ancient kings as he, Gandalf and the other members of the broken fellowship struggle to save Gondor from Sauron's forces. Meanwhile, Frodo and Sam take the ring closer to the heart of Mordor, the dark lord's realm.

Genre.Name: Fantasy
Genre.Description: Fantasy is a genre that uses magic and other supernatural forms as a primary element of plot, theme, and/or setting.

Director.Name: Peter Jackson
Director.Bio: Peter Robert Jackson ONZ KNZM is a New Zealand film director, producer, and screenwriter.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
Description: Frodo and Sam are trekking to Mordor to destroy the One Ring of Power while Gimli, Legolas and Aragorn search for the orc-captured Merry and Pippin. All along, nefarious wizard Saruman awaits the Fellowship members at the Orthanc Tower in Isengard.

Genre.Name: Fantasy
Genre.Description: Fantasy is a genre that uses magic and other supernatural forms as a primary element of plot, theme, and/or setting.

Director.Name: Peter Jackson
Director.Bio: Peter Robert Jackson ONZ KNZM is a New Zealand film director, producer, and screenwriter.

Title: Guardians of the Galaxy Volume 3
Description: Peter Quill, still reeling from the loss of Gamora, must rally his team around him to defend the universe along with protecting one of their own. A mission that, if not completed successfully, could quite possibly lead to the end of the Guardians as we know them.

Genre.Name: Science Fiction
Genre.Description: Science fiction (or sci-fi) is a film genre that uses speculative, fictional science-based depictions of phenomena that are not fully accepted by mainstream science.

Director.Name: James Gunn
Director.Bio: James Francis Gunn Jr. is an American film director, producer, and screenwriter.

Title: Inception
Description: Cobb, a skilled thief who commits corporate espionage by infiltrating the subconscious of his targets is offered a chance to regain his old life as payment for a task considered to be impossible: "inception", the implantation of another person's idea into a target's subconscious.

Genre.Name: Science Fiction
Genre.Description: Science fiction (or sci-fi) is a film genre that uses speculative, fictional science-based depictions of phenomena that are not fully accepted by mainstream science.

Director.Name: Christopher Nolan
Director.Bio: Christopher is a British film director and writer acclaimed for his noirish visual aesthetic and unconventional, often highly conceptual narratives.

Title: Interstellar
Description: The adventures of a group of explorers who make use of a newly discovered wormhole to surpass the limitations on human space travel and conquer the vast distances involved in an interstellar voyage.

Genre.Name: Science Fiction
Genre.Description: Science fiction (or sci-fi) is a film genre that uses speculative, fictional science-based depictions of phenomena that are not fully accepted by mainstream science.

Director.Name: Christopher Nolan
Director.Bio: Christopher is a British film director and writer acclaimed for his noirish visual aesthetic and unconventional, often highly conceptual narratives.

Title: The Dark Knight
Description: Batman raises the stakes in his war on crime. With the help of Lt. Jim Gordon and District Attorney Harvey Dent, Batman sets out to dismantle the remaining criminal organizations that plague the streets. The partnership proves to be effective, but they soon find themselves prey to a reign of chaos unleashed by a rising criminal mastermind known to the terrified citizens of Gotham as the Joker.

Genre.Name: Action
Genre.Description: Action film is a genre in which the protagonist or protagonists are thrust into a series of challenges that typically include violence, extended fighting, physical feats, and frantic chases.

Director.Name: Christopher Nolan
Director.Bio: Christopher is a British film director and writer acclaimed for his noirish visual aesthetic and unconventional, often highly conceptual narratives.

Title: The Book of Eli
Description: A post-apocalyptic tale, in which a lone man fights his way across America in order to protect a sacred book that holds the secrets to saving humankind.

Genre.Name: Action
Genre.Description: Action film is a genre in which the protagonist or protagonists are thrust into a series of challenges that typically include violence, extended fighting, physical feats, and frantic chases.

Director.Name: The Hughes Brothers
Director.Bio: Albert and Allen Hughes, known together professionally as the Hughes brothers, are American film directors and producers.

Title: Parasite
Description: All unemployed, Ki-taek's family takes peculiar interest in the wealthy and glamorous Parks for their livelihood until they get entangled in an unexpected incident.

Genre.Name: Thriller
Genre.Description: Thriller film, also known as suspense film or suspense thriller, is a broad film genre that involves excitement and suspense in the audience.

Director.Name: Bong Joon-ho
Director.Bio: Bong Joon-ho is a South Korean film director and screenwriter.

Title: Forrest Gump
Description: A man with a low IQ has accomplished great things in his life and been present during significant historic eventsâ€”in each case, far exceeding what anyone imagined he could do. But despite all he has achieved, his one true love eludes him.

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: Drama film is a genre that relies on the emotional and relational development of realistic characters.

Director.Name: Robert Zemeckis
Director.Bio: Robert Lee Zemeckis is an American film director, producer, and screenwriter.
